credit_line: The Linda and Irwin R. Berman Stool Collection
title: W.W.
description: Aluminum stool of fluid biomorphic form, the slender, curving, tripod legs rising to a roughly triangular, up-turned and slanted seat/suport with curled projection rising from one side;  the central leg with short spike-like projection as foot rest. The whole varnished in turquoise colored enamel.
name: Stool
